name: Lemon Burst Cupcakes
author: Anonymous
summary: Mmm! There's a surprise burst of creamy lemon filling inside these delicious cupcakes.
ingredients: 1 (18.25 ounce) box Betty Crocker® SuperMoist® white cake mix
1 (12 ounce) container Betty Crocker® Whipped fluffy white frosting
¼ cup Betty Crocker® yellow candy sprinkles
¼ cup Betty Crocker® white candy sprinkles
directions: Heat oven to 350 degrees F for shiny metal pans (or 325 degrees F for dark or nonstick pans)
Place paper baking cup in each of 24 regular-size muffin cups
In large bowl, make cake mix as directed on box, using water, oil and egg whites
Divide batter evenly among muffin cups
Bake as directed on box or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean
Cool 10 minutes; remove from pan to cooling rack
Spoon lemon curd into corner of resealable heavy-duty food-storage plastic bag
Cut about 1/4 inch off corner of bag
Gently push cut corner of bag into center of cupcake
Squeeze about 2 teaspoons lemon curd into center of each cupcake for filling, being careful not to split cupcake
To decorate, roll edge of each cupcake in candy sprinkles
Store loosely covered at room temperature
